answers.answer: Drinking lots and lots of water. Eating fruits for vit c like berries and oranges. And nuts as well. I had atleast fruiys for five times a day and it helped me. Hope ot helps you as well.
With gestational diabetes I was told little to no fruit. :(
Aww i have gdm too. But i am allowed to take fruits. Sorry love..
Lucky....:( I miss apples...granny smith apples.

question: Anyone have any tips for relieving swelling? I had to take an emergency flight last night and then drive for 3 hours due to my mom having emergency surgery....33 weeks. It's bad and sore...keeping hydrated and moving and putting them up when I can...any other Ideas???
title: Swelling relief
